name: Intense Love Shot
description:
Intense Love Shot is a action shooter game. Our hero is YOU, and your job is to save the world against evil succubus who invaded the kingdom.
And you'll make a lot of friends that will help you along the way, and make your enemies fold in pleasure.
This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life, with a lot of hentai scenes and challenges.

  • -Nudity or sexual content
  • -All scenes within the game are consensual
  • -25 different stages
  • -Upgrades
  • -5 Skills
  • -36 H-SCENES
  • -Not suitable for watching at work
  • -Not suitable for all ages
  • -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
